pages.md:
# Focus Mode C (AF-C)

| Option      | Description                                                                 | Sample Image                  |
|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------|
| SINGLE POINT| Focus tracks subject at selected focus point. Use for subjects moving toward or away from camera. | !Single Point Focus |
| ZONE        | Camera tracks focus in selected focus zone. Use for subjects that are moving fairly predictably. | !Zone Focus |
| TRACKING    | Focus tracks subjects moving through wide area of frame.                    | !Tracking Focus |

Rotate the rear command dial in the focus-point selection display (pages 97, 99) to cycle through the AF modes selected for **AF/MF SETTING > AF MODE ALL SETTING**.

rows: Focus tracks subject at selected focus point. Use for subjects moving toward or away from camera.
Camera tracks focus in selected focus zone. Use for subjects that are moving fairly predictably.
Focus tracks subjects moving through wide area of frame.
